https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/9un8dCFMCp6EHw1ett8sKNmTxEu.jpg Tensions abound in the relationships featured in the three episodes which make up the film - that between two young children and their stepfather, a cripple setting off alone on a pilgrimage without the company of his fellow villagers, and a teacher returning to his remote village and finding himself the subject of unrealistic expectations of the other villagers. Birth of a Butterfly
